content: A hacker  known for unleashing a worm on the once-popular MySpace social network  said he has devised a technique to crack under two minutes any combination by Master Lock  a padlock company owned by Fortune Brands Home & Security Inc.
name: Fortune Brands Home & Security Inc
title: Hacker claims to crack Master Lock combos under two minutes

title: Hacker claims to crack Master Lock combos under 2 minutes
